reviews.title: Terribly annoying?
reviews.comment: Constant crashing and ads are extremely intrusive. I understand ads are necessary but seriously, you guys need to take some notes from the break video guys. Their app is way better. This app is terrible.
reviews.author: Nicholas Chase

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: After the update it doesn\'t crash and loads faster, also fixed full screen and share problems
reviews.author: Rory Henderson

reviews.title: What is the point?
reviews.comment: Why bother putting this app out? It is slow, it has no functionality compare to web page and videos will not play! Uninstalled.
reviews.author: stephane mermier

reviews.title: Trash!
reviews.comment: I go to EBW everyday, but this app is trash! You never know if a video is even going to play, even though they claim they fixed it. Galleries aren\'t shown in full screen. And as of today, no matter what I click on, it justs keeps reloading the home page. Also, the ads are freaking annoying!
reviews.author: Erik Rinehart

reviews.title: Could be alot better
reviews.comment: Love ebaumsworld and its great to have an app but its not very good to be honest, all it is is a mobilr device optimised web page, so not really an app jist a web page shortcut next to your apps.. hate having the advertisement on there, clicking on a gallery should launch a full screen gallery, clicking on a video should launch your device full screen video player, unfortunatly its does not do any of these things, its just the mobile web page.. so yeah a bit dissapointed..
reviews.author: Morgan Maggs

reviews.title: What garbage..
reviews.comment: Love ebaum,but this app is pointless...dosnt work half the time,and when it dose its slow....looks the same as there mobil page so has me wondering if its just a link to open there page...i can do that without the app..unonstalling
reviews.author: David Filippone

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: The site is cool, but the app blows...nothing ever plays or loads...don\'t waste ur time. Just go to the site. Terrible
reviews.author: Todd Allen Durkin

reviews.title: It sucks
reviews.comment: Anyone can create a short cut to eBaums world.  Slow as heck and way too many ads. If the videos manage to play you are in luck!
reviews.author: Brandon Tysinger

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app. Not easy to share videos onto Facebook.

reviews.comment: All this app is, it\'s the .mobile version of the website. The iPhone app is 20X better

reviews.comment: Getting close...

reviews.comment: It will not stop crashing. Other than that, it\'s good.
